Name: Tanhaji - The Lion Maratha Warrior of Ch. Shivaji
About the game: Tanhaji-The Lion Maratha Warrior is a free game made as a tribute to the warrior Tanhaji Malusare, and dedicated to the great Warrior king 'Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj '. Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj was the founder of hindavi Swarajya. Many Maratha soldiers had given their life to build the Maratha Empire and Tanhaji was one of them. This game is also the first 3D War Culture Game on Indian Maratha History. It is one of the best free mobile fighting games you will ever play. It offers a simulation-like experience of a Warriors life Tanhaji game is just like other Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj games available on play store but Tanhaji game is the first 3d Indian war game ever and also the first Maratha warrior game. This is the first action Role Playing Game on Maratha Warrior and Maharashtrian Culture. This game is all about winning the fort Kondhana back using strategy and skill. In this game you become Tanhaji the Lion Maratha Warrior. Try winning the Great fort using your sword to kill enemy soldiers. Fight a bloody war against the Mughal subhedar Udaybhan and his right hand - Siddhi Hilal. There are 12 Levels of the game and in each level as the Character hero Tanhaji achieve new height of bravery Game would award a new Rank to his Name. In this way he would start from Rank Mawala to raise through Sarnaubat.These were the real Ranks in Maratha Infantry during the Era of great Shivaji Maharaj.Download this game In the Memory of the Tanhaji who lost his life for the Victory of Maratha on Feb 4th 1670! Tanhaji- The Lion Maratha Warrior , Amazing Game on the history of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj we all like a History of Chattrapti Shivaji maharaj and their soldier. The gameplay is best and Adventures, you are become mavla and play the all levels and win kondhana fort.
